1569534830_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: We need to peacefully and legally take back our government which has been taken over by corporations.  This can be done, I am in the process of doing it.  Two websites I recommend are annavonreitz.com and paulstramer.net.  The articles there can get anyone on the road to being free of the corporate tyranny we're under right now.  We the people are supposed to run the show, not "representatives."
